## MaterialGCOptions type

Garbage collection options for material

**Signature:**

```typescript
type MaterialGCOptions = {
    disabled?: boolean;
    drawableCountThreshold?: number;
    materialCountThreshold?: number;
    inactiveTimeDuration?: number;
    verbose?: boolean;
};
```
